sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {ServiceContainer, ServiceInfoWrapper, ServiceH1, ServiceH3, ServiceInfoContainer } from './ServiceElements' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img} from './ServiceElements' import TitleUnderline from '../../images/shape-titleunderline.png'; import img1 from '../../images/service-img-1.png' const ServiceSection = ({ id, imgStart, topLine, headLine, description, pic, alt}) => { return ( <> Service 블루닷의 양방향소통의 장점을 살린 서비스는 쉽고 간편하지만 활용가치가 무궁무진합니다. {/* */} {topLine} {description} {/* */} {/* {topLine} {headLine} {description} */} ) } export default ServiceSection
